fields.description: The specific sub-set of file level copyright data representations requested
The sha1 encoding of the file contents
The copyright data for the file
This field always returns an empty string and is only present to maintain backwards compatibility
The byte where the copryright data begins
The byte where the copyright data ends
The relative path to the file
The relative path to the archive file
Meta data associated with the representation, as described in <<metadata,Meta Data>>
Meta data associated with the representation, as described in <<metadata,Meta Data>>

links.description: A link to the next page of the results set, present only if there is another page of results
